summary.subject: Call for Papers: TOSEM special issue in Agentic AI

special_issue.title: Agentic Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Software
special_issue.journal: ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology
special_issue.focus: The special issue will focus on the impact of Agentic AI on software engineering, including various branches such as coding, testing, analysis, patching, documentation, and design.
themes: Automation of SE tasks via agents
Integration of agents into existing software workflows
Agent-human interaction in SE teams and team dynamics
Other agent in SE topics not covered in the preceding list

submission_details.submission_button: Special issue 2025: Agentic AI in Software
